Name: Zabbix-Webinterface
Overview:
Zabbix web interface is a part of Zabbix software. It is used to manage resources under monitoring and view monitoring statistics.

VARIABLES: If you need other variables here is a complete list of all variables: https://hub.docker.com/r/zabbix/zabbix-web-nginx-mysql/
DonateText: If you like my work please

@attributes.Name: Database IP
@attributes.Description: Your Database Host IP goes here. (I recommend you to install MariaDB from Linuxserver.io but you can use any MySQL compatible database server).

@attributes.Name: Database Port
@attributes.Description: Your Database Host Port goes here.

@attributes.Name: Database Username
@attributes.Description: Database username goes here (You have to create it first inside your database).

@attributes.Name: Database Password
@attributes.Description: Database password goes here (You have to create it first inside your database).

@attributes.Name: Database Name
@attributes.Description: Databasename goes here (You have to create it first inside your database).

@attributes.Name: Zabbix Server IP
@attributes.Description: Your Zabbix Server IP goes here.

@attributes.Name: Zabbix Server Port
@attributes.Description: Your Zabbix Server Port goes here.

@attributes.Name: PHP Timezone
@attributes.Description: Your timezone goes here (you can find a list of timezones at: https://www.php.net/manual/en/timezones.php )

@attributes.Name: Name of the Zabbix Server
@attributes.Description: The name of the server that will show up in the webgui.

@attributes.Name: SSL Certificate
@attributes.Description:
The volume allows to enable HTTPS for the Zabbix web interface. The volume must contains two files ssl.crt, ssl.key and dhparam.pem prepared for Nginx SSL connections.
Please follow official Nginx documentation to get more details about how to create certificate files.
(If you allready got a webserver you also can reverse proxy this container)

CAComment: This template is set up to use a custom network. You may have to adjust the network or IP address etc to match your system
